scripts.build: vite build && rm -rf webfrontend/htmlauth/assets && cp -r build/assets webfrontend/htmlauth/assets && cp build/build.html templates/index.html
scripts.release:major: npm run build && changelog -M -a && node .github/release.js major false
scripts.release:minor: npm run build && changelog -m -a && node .github/release.js minor false
scripts.release:patch: npm run build && changelog -p -a && node .github/release.js patch false
scripts.pre:major: npm run build && changelog -M -a && node .github/release.js major true
scripts.pre:minor: npm run build && changelog -m -a && node .github/release.js minor true
scripts.pre:patch: npm run build && changelog -p -a && node .github/release.js patch true
